locations.name: Denis Island
locations.description: An exclusive private coral island focused on barefoot luxury, conservation, and connection with nature, offering serene isolation and unique wildlife experiences like giant tortoises.

locations.name: Praslin
locations.description: A larger granitic island known for the UNESCO World Heritage site Vallée de Mai (home to the Coco de Mer palm) and world-renowned beaches like Anse Lazio, offering more exploration opportunities.
